title: Glassdoor Company Profile Setup: Complete Guide to Employer Branding
description: Learn how to create and optimize your Glassdoor company profile to attract top talent, improve employer branding, and manage your company's reputation.

seo.title: Glassdoor Company Profile Guide 2024 | Improve Employer Branding
seo.description: Master Glassdoor company profile optimization with our comprehensive guide. Attract top talent, build employer brand, and manage company reputation.

requirements: Official company logo and branding materials

sections.title: Set Up Your Glassdoor Employer Account
sections.content:
Begin by visiting glassdoor.com/employers and clicking 'Get Started'. You'll need to verify your company and claim your existing profile if one exists.

Company Verification:

  • Provide official company registration documents
  • Verify your email domain matches your company
  • Submit business license or incorporation papers
  • Confirm company address and contact information

Profile Claiming:

  • Search for your company on Glassdoor first
  • If a profile exists, claim it through the verification process
  • If no profile exists, create a new one
  • Merge duplicate profiles if necessary

The verification process typically takes 3-5 business days for approval.
tips: Have all company documents ready before starting
Use your official company email address for verification
Check for existing profiles under different company name variations

sections.title: Create a Compelling Company Overview
sections.content:
Your company overview is the first impression potential employees get. Make it count:

Company Description:

  • Write a 200-500 word description of your company
  • Highlight your mission, values, and culture
  • Include key achievements and milestones
  • Mention growth opportunities and career development

Company Details:

  • Industry classification and business type
  • Company size and number of employees
  • Founded date and headquarters location
  • Revenue range and ownership type

Mission and Values:

  • Clearly articulate your company mission
  • List core values with brief explanations
  • Include diversity and inclusion statements
  • Highlight social responsibility initiatives
tips: Use language that resonates with your target candidates
Include keywords that job seekers search for
Keep the tone authentic and engaging

sections.title: Showcase Your Workplace with Photos and Videos
sections.content:
Visual content helps candidates envision themselves working at your company:

Office Photos:

  • Upload 10-15 high-quality workplace photos
  • Show different areas: offices, meeting rooms, common areas
  • Include photos of team events and activities
  • Highlight unique office features and amenities

Team Photos:

  • Include diverse team members in natural settings
  • Show collaboration and teamwork in action
  • Capture both formal and informal moments
  • Ensure photos represent your actual workforce

Video Content:

  • Create a company culture video (2-3 minutes)
  • Include employee testimonials
  • Show a day-in-the-life at your company
  • Highlight unique perks and benefits

Companies with photos and videos receive 40% more profile views than those without.
tips: Include captions that explain what's shown
Update photos regularly to keep content fresh

sections.title: Highlight Benefits and Perks
sections.content:
Comprehensive benefits information helps attract quality candidates:

Health and Wellness:

  • Health insurance coverage details
  • Dental and vision insurance options
  • Mental health and wellness programs
  • Fitness and gym memberships

Time Off and Flexibility:

  • Vacation and sick leave policies
  • Flexible work arrangements
  • Remote work options
  • Sabbatical and extended leave programs

Financial Benefits:

  • Retirement plans and 401(k) matching
  • Stock options or equity programs
  • Performance bonuses and incentives
  • Professional development budgets

Unique Perks:

  • Free meals or snacks
  • Transportation benefits
  • Pet-friendly policies
  • Employee discount programs
tips: Be specific about benefit details and eligibility
Highlight benefits that differentiate you from competitors
Update benefits information when policies change

sections.title: Manage Employee Reviews Effectively
sections.content:
Employee reviews significantly impact your employer brand. Develop a strategy for managing them:

Encouraging Positive Reviews:

  • Create a positive workplace culture that naturally generates good reviews
  • Ask satisfied employees to share their experiences
  • Provide guidelines for writing helpful reviews
  • Never incentivize or require employees to write reviews

Responding to Reviews:

  • Respond to reviews professionally and thoughtfully
  • Thank employees for positive feedback
  • Address concerns raised in negative reviews
  • Show that you value employee feedback

Review Analysis:

  • Monitor review trends and common themes
  • Use feedback to identify areas for improvement
  • Track your overall rating and review volume
  • Compare your ratings to industry benchmarks

Companies with 4.0+ star ratings receive 50% more qualified applications.
tips: Use review feedback to improve workplace culture

sections.title: Optimize Job Postings for Maximum Visibility
sections.content:
Well-crafted job postings attract better candidates and improve your employer brand:

Job Title Optimization:

  • Use clear, standard job titles that candidates search for
  • Avoid internal jargon or creative titles
  • Include seniority level when appropriate
  • Be specific about the role and department

Job Description Best Practices:

  • Start with a compelling company overview
  • Clearly outline responsibilities and expectations
  • List required and preferred qualifications
  • Include salary range when possible

Application Process:

  • Make the application process simple and mobile-friendly
  • Clearly state next steps and timeline
  • Provide contact information for questions
  • Set realistic expectations for response time

SEO Optimization: Use relevant keywords that job seekers search for to improve visibility in Glassdoor's job search results.
tips: Include salary ranges to attract serious candidates
Use bullet points for easy scanning
Highlight growth opportunities and career development
